data.title: Joaquin Phoenix
data.meta_description:
JOAQUIN PHOENIX - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. Joaquin Phoenix was born in Puerto Rico in 1974 to American parents who were traveling with a religious cult called The Children of God. He and his siblings all had nature-inspired names and moved frequently between different countries. At age 6, he changed his name to Leaf before switching back to his birth name at 16. His parents eventually left the cult and moved back to the US, changing their last name to Phoenix as a symbol of new beginnings. 

Phoenix began acting with his brother River in commercials and small roles, admiring River greatly until his death from an overdose. One of his early films was Space Camp. He went on to have notable roles in films like To Die For, Gladiator,
